underlying_goal: Plan and understand the codebase architecture for implementing STEP 8 subtitle/subheading bulk registration in the izumo-dev CMS system
friction_detail: Browser navigation to izumo-dev admin page failed with ERR_TOO_MANY_REDIRECTS due to missing Basic auth credentials.
brief_summary: User needed Claude to explore and understand the codebase for STEP 8 subtitle registration; Claude completed an extensive planning/exploration phase across multiple files but no implementation was started within the session.
